custom_instructions.card: Use sharp corners (rounded-none) with a thin 1px border-zinc-800. Add a subtle gold glow on hover (hover:border-primary/50).
custom_instructions.button: Pill-shaped or sharp? Go SHARP for this tactical feel. Primary buttons should be solid Gold (#D4A017) with Black text. Secondary buttons should be outline Zinc-700.
custom_instructions.sidebar: Fixed left sidebar, dark glass (bg-zinc-950/90), thin right border. Active link has a Gold left border indicator.
custom_instructions.kanban: Columns should be bg-zinc-900/30. Cards inside should be bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL_DEPENDENCIES: npm install recharts lucide-react react-simple-maps dnd-kit @dnd-kit/core @dnd-kit/sortable @dnd-kit/utilities
THEME_SETUP: Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the root HTML element by default.
LAYOUT_STRATEGY: Use a persistent SidebarLayout with a top Header for global stats.
REAL_TIME_FEEL: Use pulsing animations (animate-pulse) for 'Live' status indicators.
MAP_IMPLEMENTATION: Use a simple SVG map of Texas or a placeholder component if the library is too complex, but styling must be dark with gold markers.
DATA_DENSITY: Do not use generous whitespace here. This is a command center. Compact rows, small text (text-sm), high information density.
GOLD_ACCENT: Use the gold color (#D4A017) sparingly for: Key metrics (Money), Deal Status, Active Agents, and Primary CTAs.
FONT_USAGE: Import Manrope for headings and Inter for body from Google Fonts. Use JetBrains Mono for all pricing/numbers.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ü§ñüß†üí≠üí°üîÆüéØüìöüé≠üé¨üé™üéâüéäüéÅüéÄüéÇüç∞üéàüé®üé∞üí∞üíµüí≥üè¶üíéü™ôüí∏ü§ëüìäüìàüìâüíπüî¢üèÜü•á etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
